text: 11.16 Kis 3.6, 3.15, Mak 12.26, Apo 7.32, Plp 3.20, Hib 13.14 gos awl kɨli man teplep yɨbɨl olap amnak, God man ne alaŋ ak nep. Pen binɨb anɨb okok kɨli God nop apal, Nad God chɨn apal, anɨb ak tek ne kɨlop nɨgek nop nebeŋ ma gup, nop tep yɨbɨl gup. Ak nɨm ne taun awl ak gɨtep gɨlek, kɨli am yenɨgabal.
